mapper.select: SELECT point_history_no, m_point_no, type_code, point_history_before, point_history_change, point_history_after, point_history_date, status_code FROM point_history WHERE m_point_no = #{memberPointNo};
SELECT m_point FROM member_point WHERE m_point_no = #{memberPointNo};
SELECT point_history_no FROM point_history ORDER BY point_history_no DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO point_history (point_history_no, m_point_no, type_code, point_history_before, point_history_change, point_history_after, status_code) VALUES (#{pointHistoryNo}, #{memberPointNo}, #{type}, #{pointHistoryBefore}, #{pointHistoryChange}, #{pointHistoryAfter}, #{status});
